name: Cubone
author: Shinya Komatsu
flavor_text: This Pokémon wears the skull of its deceased mother. Sometimes Cubone’s dreams make it cry, but each tear Cubone sheds makes it stronger.

abilities.name: Cheering Bone
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, attacks used by your Marowak do 30 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Hit Twice
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.
